subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yanking Oliver Perez and his 9.31 earned run average would be the biggest indictment of Perez to date. But expect him to make at least one more start before the Mets take drastic measures.
snippet: Yanking Oliver Perez and his 9.31 earned run average would be the biggest indictment of Perez to date. But expect him to make at least one more start before the Mets take drastic measures.
